data.what_is: Lead Guerrilla by 1CRM is a cloud-based all-in-one marketing platform for small to midsize businesses and marketing agencies. Key features of Lead Guerrilla are: lead activity tracking (website browsing history, form submissions, email opening, PDF downloads, and website chat interaction), multi-channel campaigns (across email, text messages, Twitter and web notifications) and a graphical decision-tree-based campaign workflow designer. Additional features include a graphical dashboard, reporting and analytics, lead scoring, landing page and web form creation, and email template design.
data.product_description: Lead Guerrilla is a control panel for your brand's marketing efforts, organizing your website, social media, text and email communications into a single, intuitive Marketing Automation system.
data.supported_languages: Danish, German, English, Finnish, French, Italian, Dutch, Spanish, Swedish

Happy to recommend the product to complete the marketing efforts
